attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most of us have the irritation of receiving a phonecall offering us goods and services, or perish the thought, political speeches that we don't require! The calls often come in at the most inconvenient of times, during meals, favourite TV programmes or even late at night when people are asleep! We are ex-directory but still suffer this nuisance! Cold calling should be a specific offence and the perpetrators subject to heavy fines.
